title: Microwave Oven Gloves,Black Gold Gray Liquid Marble Pattern Oven Mitts Heat Resistant Durable Kitchen Gloves Perfect for BBQ, Cooking, Grilling, Baking Set of 2,11inch
features: SAFE COOKING: Waterproof polyester fabric is used, safe and environmental protection, and is heat resistant and anti-scald material,effective protect your hands and wrists from burns. CLEANING TIPS: Do not wash with alcohol detergent, do not machine wash, do not bleach.

description: This oven glove is made of polyester. The design is soft and beautiful. It feels light and comfortable. It can be used indoors and outdoors. It is thick and soft, and does not hurt tableware.
High-quality production, waterproof and dirt-resistant, beautiful and light, flexible. Classic design can be used for a long time.
The best combination of various activities. Restaurants, kitchens, bars or holiday campsites are all suitable.
